alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Clay; Clinton; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:53AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Buchanan, Clinton, northwestern Clay and northeastern Platte Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1153 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Platte City, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Smithville, Platte City, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Weston, Gower, Agency, Trimble, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point, Ferrelview, Tracy, Easton, Ridgely, Kansas City Intl Arpt and Hoover. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 40 and 42. Interstate 29 between mile markers 10 and 35. Interstate 435 between mile markers 29 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
